description: This file defines a class 'CustomApiTools' that extends 'Toolkit' to provide HTTP API request capabilities, including handling authentication, headers, and making requests with various HTTP methods. It also includes detailed request handling with error management.

classes.name: CustomApiTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for making authenticated HTTP API requests with customizable options.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the CustomApiTools with optional base URL, credentials, headers, SSL verification, timeout, and request-making flag.

methods.name: _get_auth
methods.description: Returns an HTTPBasicAuth object if username and password are provided, otherwise None.

methods.name: _get_headers
methods.description: Combines default headers with additional headers and adds authorization if api_key is set.

methods.name: make_request
methods.description: Performs an HTTP request to the specified endpoint with given method, parameters, headers, and data, returning the response as a JSON string.
